example: Severe storms can destroy crops in the field, causing huge losses for farmers.
Water vapor rises from the ocean and forms clouds in the sky.

Scientists conduct a study to analyze the impact of climate change on agriculture.
Farmers run the risk of losing their crops during a drought.
Prolonged lack of rainfall can cause a drought in agricultural areas.

english: have a high level of pollution
example: Industrial areas often have a high level of air pollution.
Farmers interact with agricultural experts to improve crop yields.
Warm weather and adequate rainfall create favorable conditions for crop growth.
Natural variation in climate can affect crop production from year to year.
The crop failure had nothing to do with the new farming method.

Scientists are seeking a replacement for chemical fertilizers.
Solar power is a popular alternative source of energy in rural areas.
We might run out of traditional energy sources if we don't find alternatives.
Many alternative energy sources derive from natural processes.
Biofuel can be a by-product of agricultural production.
Some farmers refuse to adopt new technologies due to tradition.
Experts point out that climate change is affecting crop growth.
This farming method is restricted to certain types of crops.
To be specific, this fertilizer works best for grain crops.
Some groups object to the use of genetically modified crops.
Many communities rely on agriculture for their livelihood.
Plants absorb nutrients in the form of minerals from the soil.
Traditional farming is sustainable; on the other hand, it can be less efficient.
Fossil fuels are a finite source, so we need alternative energy.
Hailstones can fall with great force and damage crops.
Pesticides are sprayed on crops to prevent insect damage.
New farming techniques are effective in increasing crop yields.
Water turns to ice at the freezing point of 0°C.

Studies support the value of organic farming for the environment.
Changing weather patterns raise problems for traditional farming.
Farmers question the effectiveness of the new pesticide.
The research was conducted by a team of agricultural scientists.
Plants tend to grow faster in warm temperatures.
Farmers reject the statement that their methods are outdated.
Climate affects crops; that is to say, temperature and rainfall matter most.
The natural variations in soil quality affect crop growth.
Sunlight is key to the formation of chlorophyll in plants.
Improved farming methods have increased crop yield significantly.
Healthy soil leads to good crops, which in turn supports local economies.
Drought-resistant crops have advantages over traditional ones in dry areas.
Carbon dioxide is an unavoidable by-product of fossil fuel combustion.

english: be twice as efficient in doing
chinese: 在做某事时效率是两倍的
example: The new machine is twice as efficient in harvesting crops as the old one.
